meanings.sent1: The dog left a pile of kaka on the grass.
meanings.sent2: Please clean up after your pet's kaka.
meanings.sent3: The toddler mistook the kaka for chocolate and tried to eat it.
meanings.sent4: The kaka in the toilet smelled worse than a skunk.
meanings.sent5: The kaka in the litter box needed to be scooped out daily.

meanings.sent1: Don't be a kaka and listen to your parents.
meanings.sent2: The class clown was known for being a kaka.
meanings.sent3: The kaka thought wearing socks on his hands was a great idea.
meanings.sent4: She realized she had been dating a kaka all along.
meanings.sent5: The kaka's antics always made everyone laugh.

meanings.sent1: The baby kakaed in his diaper during the car ride.
meanings.sent2: Please teach your puppy where to kaka outside.
meanings.sent3: The bear seemed to kaka in the woods without a care.
meanings.sent4: The bird kakaed on the car windshield just after it was cleaned.
meanings.sent5: The cat always chooses to kaka in the flower bed instead of the litter box.
